statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ 5 \\ 13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -12 \\ -3 \\ -6 \\ 15 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
